description: Defend the elemental crystals from waves of invading monsters using towers infused with elemental powers.

towers.name: Flame Tower
towers.description: Shoots fireballs that burn enemies over time.
upgrades: Adds a chance to stun enemies

towers.name: Frost Tower
towers.description: Slows enemies with chilling ice bolts.

towers.name: Gaia Tower
towers.description: Spawns thorn vines to entangle and damage enemies.
upgrades: Chance for vines to root enemies in place

enemies.name: Goblin
enemies.description: Small, quick, and weak to fire.

enemies.name: Orc
enemies.description: Big, slow, and weak to ice.
variants: Shieldbearer - High defense from the front

enemies.name: Treant
enemies.description: Lumbers slowly, spawns saplings, weak to fire.
variants: Elder Treant - Tanky and spawns more saplings
Entling - Small treant spawned by others

progressionSystems.name: Element Mastery
progressionSystems.description: Earn elemental mastery points to unlock tower upgrades and passive buffs.

fire: Towers gain a fire damage aura
ice: Ice towers can freeze flying enemies
electricity: Lightning tower hits can jump to more enemies
earth: Gaia towers can spawn healing pods

progressionSystems.name: Rune Crafting
progressionSystems.description: Collect rune fragments from slain enemies to craft special runes that can be socketed into towers for unique effects.
sampleRunes: Rune of Swiftness - Increases tower attack speed
Rune of Elements - Adds a secondary element to the tower
Rune of Riches - Boosts gold earned from that tower's kills
Rune of Destruction - Substantially increases damage but lowers range

specialMechanics.name: Elemental Overload
specialMechanics.description: Casting multiple towers of the same element next to each other builds Overload. At full Overload they unleash a powerful special attack.

overloadEffects.fire: Summons a fire meteor to scorch enemies
overloadEffects.ice: Blasts the area with a blizzard that freezes and damages
overloadEffects.electricity: Calls a lightning storm to rapidly strike enemies
overloadEffects.earth: Quakes the ground to damage and root all enemies

specialMechanics.name: Mana Wells
specialMechanics.description: Build your towers near Mana Wells to increase their power. Wells recharge between waves and can be upgraded.

specialMechanics.name: Elemental Champions
specialMechanics.description: Call forth powerful elemental beings to aid you during battle. They are summoned using Elemental Charges earned from slaying enemies.
champions: Phoenix - Flies the path raining fire down
Frost Giant - Smashes and freezes enemies
Lightning Serpent - Electrifies an area stunning and damaging foes
Terraformer - Manipulates the battlefield to hinder enemies

visualStyle.artStyle: Vibrant, colorful with distinct elemental visual effects

animations.towers: Unique attack animations for each element
animations.effects: Spectacular elemental effects for special abilities

audio.music: Epic fantasy soundtrack that intensifies during waves

soundEffects.towers: Unique sound for each tower type
soundEffects.enemies: Distinctive sounds for different enemy types
soundEffects.abilities: Powerful sounds for special abilities and overloads

monetization.model: Free to play with optional purchases

uniqueSellingPoints: Elemental synergy system that rewards strategic tower placement
Dynamic enemy AI that adapts to player strategies
Deep progression systems with multiple upgrade paths
Interactive environments with destructible elements and terrain advantages
